name: ᴬʷᵒᵒt of Control
description:
Theme: out of control.

Farming sim meets tower defense in this quaint pixel art game made in 48hrs for the #GMTKJam 2020.

Play as a shepard cursed to transform into a werewolf as the sun sets each night. 

Plant defensive crops with varying effects around the paddock to protect your herd from yourself when you lose control!

Hint: Keep an eye on the day/night indicator; when dusk hits, run to get as much distance between the wolf and the sheep as possible!

Controls

WASD - movement

Left click - interact

Right click - removes placed crops

??? - to control the wolf

Art

Josie

Programming 

Alex

Jack

Tim

Featuring howls from:

Jackson

All art assets and audio spot effects were created by this team during the jam. However, we did not create nor do we own the background music used.

Third party assets:

"Unholy Knight" by Kevin Macleod

"Wholesome" by Kevin Macleod
